src package¶

Submodules¶

src.core module¶

src.core.plot_simulation(X, cmap=<matplotlib.colors.LinearSegmentedColormap object>, vmin=-2, vmax=2)¶

Plot mock simulation data.

Pseudocolor plot of the mock simulation data using cmocean colormaps.

Parameters:

  • X (np.ndarray) – Simulation data

  • cmap – Valid matplotlib colormap for pcolormesh cmap argument

  • vmin (int) – Min and max colorbar limits

  • vmax (int) – Min and max colorbar limits

src.core.run_simulation(size=(100, 100))¶

Produce mock ‘simulation’ data (Gaussian noise)

Some longer explanation about purpose and science.

Parameters:

size (tuple of int) – Size of simulation data to produce

Returns:

Simulation ‘data’ with shape size

Return type:

np.ndarray

src.helpers module¶

Provide additional functionality to core module.

src.helpers.helper1(x, flag=True)¶

Help run simulations.

Parameters:

  • x (float) – Simulation parameter setting. Between [0, 1]

  • flag (bool) – Flag to control simulation behaviour

Returns:

Simulation outputs.

Return type:

np.ndarray
